job.title: Machine Learning Engineer, Viral Projects (Remote)
job.description:
AssemblyAI (www.assemblyai.com) is the #1 rated API for Speech Recognition. Thousands of developers use our APIs to transcribe millions of videos, podcasts, phone calls, and zoom meetings every day - powering innovative products like visual voicemail, meeting summarizers, and closed captioning.


We're backed by leading investors including Y Combinator, John and Patrick Collison of Stripe, Daniel Gross, and Nat Friedman. We were founded in 2017.


Responsibilities:

Are you a Full Stack Engineer passionate about machine learning / deep learning that’s active on Reddit, Hacker News, Twitter, and/or YouTube? Maybe you are a former technical founder that’s not sure what you want to work on next?


We’re building an API company that will be just as well known as Twilio and Stripe. To do that, we’re investing in building a developer community around our API, and publishing high quality developer content that showcases our API’s capabilities and features. You’ll contribute to those efforts in this role, by focusing on:


  • Creating high quality developer content (blogs, tutorials, YouTube videos, Tweet threads, etc) that showcases our API’s capabilities, demonstrates various programming or ML technologies, and engages the developer community
  • Involving yourself in discussions around Speech-to-Text, Speech Recognition, or similar technologies on Reddit, Hacker News, Twitter, etc in order to expose AssemblyAI to more developers
  • Building a community of developers around our API through newsletters, Discord channels, social media, etc.


We’re a small team, and are looking for passionate, hungry, smart, and collaborative individuals that want to have a big impact.


Requirements:

  • 2+ years of experience with machine learning or deep learning
  • A track record of creating content for developers (Tweets, YouTube videos, Blogs, etc)
  • Passionate about APIs and developer tools
  • Experience engaging with developers on Reddit, Hacker News, Twitter, Stack Overflow, etc.


Benefits:

  • Competitive Salary
  • Equity
  • 100% Remote team
  • Unlimited PTO
  • Premium Healthcare (100% Covered)
  • Dental Care
  • $1K budget for your home office setup
  • New Macbook Pro (or PC if you prefer)
  • 3-4x/year company paid team retreats
